title: Spectating issues.
body:
unable to spectate any of my friends play league ATM, Anyone else having this issue?

If so is riot working on a fix does anyone know?

replies.body:
Also experiienciiing thiis problem, seems liike theres a problem with the spectate servers.

(Sorry, my i key iiis sliightly bugged...)

There is something up with the servers at the moment. I tried to spectate a game and it took about 4 mins to load the game and then lagged out when it finally loaded. My client was also lagging so I closed the client and now I can't log back in.
